mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, syllabus_file_size syllabusFileSize, syllabus_file_type syllabusFileType, syllabus_file_count syllabusFileCount, syllabus_file_original syllabusFileOriginal, syllabus_file_uuid syllabusFileUuid, syllabus_file_createdate syllabusFileCreateDate From syllabus WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo}
